模块 com.example.bubblebobble
程序包 com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.sprite

类 SpriteObject

java.lang.Object
com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.GameObject
com.ae2dms.model.gameObject.sprite.SpriteObject
直接已知子类:
Boss, Bubble, CollectEffect, Enemy, Fruit, Hero, Projectile
public abstract class SpriteObject extends GameObject
SpriteObjects are objects that can move, so each object would have its x-speed, y-speed, update method and would collide with walls SpriteObjects can detect if they are overlapping another SpriteObjects and must implement methods for collisions with every type of Unit.
